original_text:
Miami Multiplier
Benvenuti a Miami, dove i cocktail sono fruttati, le insegne al neon illuminano la notte e i moltiplicatori abbondano! La slot senza registrazione Miami Multiplier è uno dei nuovi prodotti gioco online sviluppato dal giovane brand Hacksaw Gaming e presente nella nostra libreria. Tuffati nella movida magica di questa città cosmopolita e prova subito la modalità Multiplier!
Icone semplici e luminose invadono il display
Giocare con la slot senza scaricare Miami Multiplier ti fa sentire davvero a Miami Beach, con icone di esclusivi cocktails, delfini, stelle, angurie, coni gelato e le immancabili palme, segno distintivo della promenade di Miami Beach, il tutto illuminato a neon.
Qual è la funzione principale in Miami Multiplier?
Dal titolo dovresti averlo già capito… Questo gioco è basato sui moltiplicatori! Impostato su una griglia 4 × 4, con una vincita massima di 5000X, la slot ti permette di aggiungere progressivamente i moltiplicatori durante la modalità di rotazione libera verso l’alto fino a raggiungere il top pari a 60X!
Una slot dagli Spin Gratis da brivido
Ottieni almeno tre simboli Spin Gratis per attivare la funzione di rotazione gratuita. In questa funzione tutti i simboli Multiplier vengono aggiunti progressivamente per il resto del round. Dopo ogni giro gratuito, la vincita durante il giro corrente verrà moltiplicata per il moltiplicatore attualmente visualizzato:

3 simboli ti daranno 8 giri
4 simboli ti daranno 15 giri.

Fai attenzione al simbolo X, che ti permetterà di avvicinarti  ai moltiplicatori più interessanti:

1 X ti darà un moltiplicatore 2X,
2 X ti darà un moltiplicatore 3X e così via…

Quindi ogni simbolo X si aggiunge al contatore e ogni vincita deriva dal moltiplicatore che hai progressivamente accumulato durante i tuoi giri. Tecnicamente è possibile ottenere un moltiplicatore fino a 60x, ma è molto più probabile che tu colpisca un moltiplicatore 6X o 12X entro la fine del round.
Qualche caratteristica supplementare
Al brivido dei giri gratuiti si aggiunge un RTP niente male pari al 96,30%  con una Frequenza di colpi predefinita di circa il 32,88%  e una volatilità di 4 su 5. I livelli di scommessa vanno da un minimo di 0,2€ fino ad un importo massimo di 100,00€ con la possibilità di vincere fino a 5.000 volte la tua scommessa!
Le mie conclusioni finali su questa slot elettrizzante
I moltiplicatori sono caldi e i giri gratis sono pronti per regalare incredibili vincite. Le icone semplici da individuare e l’atmosfera cool di Miami rendono i giri emozionanti. Non perdere il simbolo X che potrebbe farti ottenere vittorie spettacolari grazie alla funzionalità Multiplier, che rende questa slot gratis e giocabile nei nostri casinò online, un prezioso forziere di combinazioni vincenti!

raw_translation.response:
Welcome to Miami, where fruity cocktails, neon signs light up the night, and multipliers abound! The Miami Multiplier slot game is one of the new online gaming products developed by the young brand Hacksaw Gaming and available in our library. Dive into the magical nightlife of this cosmopolitan city and try the Multiplier mode right away!

Bright and simple icons flood the display when playing without downloading the Miami Multiplier slot, making you feel like you're truly in Miami Beach. With exclusive cocktail icons, dolphins, stars, watermelons, ice cream cones, and the ever-present palms that distinguish the Miami Beach promenade, all lit up in neon.

What's the main feature in Miami Multiplier? You should have guessed it from the title... This game is based on multipliers! Set on a 4x4 grid, with a maximum win of 5000X, the slot allows you to progressively add multipliers during free rotation mode upwards until reaching the top at 60X!

A slot with thrilling free spins where you can get at least three Free Spin symbols to activate the free rotation function. During this function, all Multiplier symbols are progressively added for the rest of the round. After each free spin, the win during the current spin will be multiplied by the currently displayed multiplier:

3 symbols will give you 8 spins
4 symbols will give you 15 spins.

Pay attention to the X symbol, which will allow you to get closer to the most interesting multipliers:

1 X will give you a 2X multiplier,
2 X will give you a 3X multiplier and so on...

So, every X symbol added to the counter, and every win derived from the multiplier you have progressively accumulated during your spins. Technically, it's possible to get up to a 60x multiplier, but it's much more likely that you'll hit a 6X or 12X multiplier by the end of the round.

Some extra features: In addition to the thrill of free spins, the game offers a pretty decent RTP of 96.30% with a predetermined Hit Frequency of about 32.88% and a volatility of 4 out of 5. The betting levels range from a minimum of €0.2 up to a maximum amount of €100, with the possibility of winning up to 5,000 times your bet!

My final thoughts on this electrifying slot: The multipliers are hot, and the free spins are ready to deliver incredible wins. The easy-to-find icons and cool Miami atmosphere make the spins exciting. Don't miss out on the X symbol that could get you spectacular wins thanks to the Multiplier functionality, which makes this slot free and playable in our online casinos, a precious treasure trove of winning combinations!

response.headline: Miami Multiplier Review
response.content: Miami Multiplier is a captivating online slot game developed by Hacksaw Gaming. It features an exciting Miami nightlife theme, with exclusive neon-lit cocktail icons, dolphins, stars, watermelons, ice cream cones, and palm trees.

response.headline: Multiplier Feature
response.content: Miami Multiplier's main feature is its exciting multiplier mode. Set on a 4x4 grid, the game allows you to progressively add multipliers during free rotation mode, scaling up to 60X. The maximum win you can achieve is 5000X.

response.headline: Free Spins
response.content: Miami Multiplier's free spins function activates with at least three Free Spin symbols. During the free spin round, all Multiplier symbols are progressively added, offering up to 60X multiplier. Every X symbol added to the counter, and every win derived from the multiplier you have progressively accumulated during your spins.

response.headline: Symbol Importance
response.content: The X symbol is of great importance in Miami Multiplier. It multiplies the incoming win by the currently displayed multiplier. There are other symbols such as dolphins, stars, watermelons, ice cream cones, and palm trees that you can get in combinations to win big prizes. The Miami Beach promenade inspired all these symbols, giving you an electrifying gaming experience.

response.headline: Game Statistics
response.content: Miami Multiplier has an RTP of 96.30%, which is pretty decent. The predetermined Hit Frequency is about 32.88%, making the game an excellent choice for risk-takers. The slot has a volatility of 4 out of 5, meaning that payouts are pretty lucrative. The maximum amount you can bet is €100, while the minimum amount is €0.2. You can win up to 5,000 times your bet.

response.headline: Betting Levels
response.content: Miami Multiplier offers a broad range of betting levels. You can choose to bet as little as €0.2 or as much as €100. The game also provides excellent chances of winning, with a maximum payout of 5,000 times your bet.

Review:
 
Miami Multiplier Review

Miami Multiplier is a captivating online slot game developed by Hacksaw Gaming. It features an exciting Miami nightlife theme, with exclusive neon-lit cocktail icons, dolphins, stars, watermelons, ice cream cones, and palm trees.

Multiplier Feature

Miami Multiplier's main feature is its exciting multiplier mode. Set on a 4x4 grid, the game allows you to progressively add multipliers during free rotation mode, scaling up to 60X. The maximum win you can achieve is 5000X.

Free Spins

Miami Multiplier's free spins function activates with at least three Free Spin symbols. During the free spin round, all Multiplier symbols are progressively added, offering up to 60X multiplier. Every X symbol added to the counter, and every win derived from the multiplier you have progressively accumulated during your spins.

Symbol Importance

The X symbol is of great importance in Miami Multiplier. It multiplies the incoming win by the currently displayed multiplier. There are other symbols such as dolphins, stars, watermelons, ice cream cones, and palm trees that you can get in combinations to win big prizes. The Miami Beach promenade inspired all these symbols, giving you an electrifying gaming experience.

Game Statistics

Miami Multiplier has an RTP of 96.30%, which is pretty decent. The predetermined Hit Frequency is about 32.88%, making the game an excellent choice for risk-takers. The slot has a volatility of 4 out of 5, meaning that payouts are pretty lucrative. The maximum amount you can bet is €100, while the minimum amount is €0.2. You can win up to 5,000 times your bet.

Betting Levels

Miami Multiplier offers a broad range of betting levels. You can choose to bet as little as €0.2 or as much as €100. The game also provides excellent chances of winning, with a maximum payout of 5,000 times your bet.

Review: Welcome to Miami, where fruity cocktails, neon signs light up the night, and multipliers abound! The Miami Multiplier slot game is one of the new online gaming products developed by the young brand Hacksaw Gaming and available in our library. Dive into the magical nightlife of this cosmopolitan city and try the Multiplier mode right away!

Bright and simple icons flood the display when playing without downloading the Miami Multiplier slot, making you feel like you're truly in Miami Beach. With exclusive cocktail icons, dolphins, stars, watermelons, ice cream cones, and the ever-present palms that distinguish the Miami Beach promenade, all lit up in neon.

What's the main feature in Miami Multiplier? You should have guessed it from the title... This game is based on multipliers! Set on a 4x4 grid, with a maximum win of 5000X, the slot allows you to progressively add multipliers during free rotation mode upwards until reaching the top at 60X!

A slot with thrilling free spins where you can get at least three Free Spin symbols to activate the free rotation function. During this function, all Multiplier symbols are progressively added for the rest of the round. After each free spin, the win during the current spin will be multiplied by the currently displayed multiplier:

3 symbols will give you 8 spins
4 symbols will give you 15 spins.

Pay attention to the X symbol, which will allow you to get closer to the most interesting multipliers:

1 X will give you a 2X multiplier,
2 X will give you a 3X multiplier and so on...

So, every X symbol added to the counter, and every win derived from the multiplier you have progressively accumulated during your spins. Technically, it's possible to get up to a 60x multiplier, but it's much more likely that you'll hit a 6X or 12X multiplier by the end of the round.

Some extra features: In addition to the thrill of free spins, the game offers a pretty decent RTP of 96.30% with a predetermined Hit Frequency of about 32.88% and a volatility of 4 out of 5. The betting levels range from a minimum of €0.2 up to a maximum amount of €100, with the possibility of winning up to 5,000 times your bet!

My final thoughts on this electrifying slot: The multipliers are hot, and the free spins are ready to deliver incredible wins. The easy-to-find icons and cool Miami atmosphere make the spins exciting. Don't miss out on the X symbol that could get you spectacular wins thanks to the Multiplier functionality, which makes this slot free and playable in our online casinos, a precious treasure trove of winning combinations!
